title: 1.23 God's Historian: The Deuteronomist
itunes:title: God's Historian: The Deuteronomist
description: Modern scholars have identified a single school behind all the books from Deuteronomy to Kings. This school wrote the histories of the kingdoms of Israel and Judah, putting its own theological slant on that history.
content:encoded: Modern scholars have identified a single school behind all the books from Deuteronomy to Kings. This school wrote the histories of the kingdoms of Israel and Judah, putting its own theological slant on that history.
itunes:subtitle: Keynote ep: The scribes who wrote the books from Deuteronomy to Kings.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
